The Ultimate New Tab Page Replacement for Chrome: Streamline Your Online Experience with New Tab Plus!

Key Features:

Customisable Shortcuts: Instantly access your favourite websites with up to 50 custom shortcuts. Whether it's news, social media, work tools, or entertainment, have everything you need just a click away.

Customisable Search Bar: Speed up your search with a versatile search bar. Choose from leading search engines like Google, Bing, and DuckDuckGo, or leverage the capabilities of ChatGPT by submitting a prompt directly from the on-page search bar - or skip search and jump straight to a website by entering a URL.

Sleek Design: Elevate your browsing with our extension's clean, minimalist, and modern design. It's not just about functionality; it's about enhancing your Chrome's look and feel for a more enjoyable online journey.

Fast and Lightweight: Designed to be unobtrusive, our extension ensures a fast, responsive, and seamless integration with Chrome, enhancing your browsing without slowing it down.

Why Choose Our Extension?

Boost Productivity: Reduce clutter and save time by having your most visited sites and preferred search engine at your fingertips.

User-Friendly: Simple and intuitive interface, ensuring ease of use for everyone.

Privacy-Conscious: We value your privacy. Our extension operates with minimal permissions and does not track your browsing activity.

Ready to redefine your Chrome browsing experience? Click the "Add to Chrome" button now and take the first step towards a more organised, efficient, and stylish online experience.
